description:
Hara Kowashi is a classmate of http://anidb.net/ch142873 [Otogi Morihito] and http://anidb.net/ch142875 [Wakatsuki Nico]. He has a weak stomach that gets upset easily so he often has to go to the toilet.
Because of this during his childhood years he had a nickname Unkoman ウンコマン, which roughly translates to "poop-man".
He has a habit to overuse "katakanized" neologisms in his speech.
Having a trauma since early age he was very hesitant to ask permission to go to the toilet during class. To solve this problem he asked Nico to put a spell on him that would mask his existence so he could leave the class untroubled and avoid the shame.
Trivia: his name is a pun on the phrase hara o kowasu 腹を壊す meaning `to get an upset stomach`.
name: Hara Kowashi
